name: Absorb Charge
effect: Try to reduce the amount of Charge by 1, if you can you gain 3 Mana.

name: Aegis of Faith
effect:
Prevents the next 5 pre-mitigation Damage dealt to the target
Does not stack

name: Aegis of Restoration
effect: While shielded by the aegis the target regenerates 1d3 Health every Turn (beginning one turn after receiving the Aegis)

name: Aegis of Retribution
effect: Whenever the target is dealt Damage (pre-mitigation) the source of the Damage is dealt 1d6 Holy Damage

name: Aerial Overhead Swing
implement: Any Two Handed Weapon, One Handed swords, bludgeons and axes
conditions: Can only be used while Falling/Jumping
effect:
Decrease Hit Chance by 4 + height in meters
Increases Force by 4 + height in meters
Increases Damage by 2 + height in meters

name: Aether Attunement
effect: Increase Mana Regneration by 1 per Level

name: Aether Blast
effect: Deals 1d6 + 2 Arcane Damage to the target

name: Aether Storm
effect: Reduce the Mana Regeneration of all Characters in a 20m radius by 5

name: Aether Winds
effect: Restore up to 3 + 1d3 Mana to all Characters within a 3m radius

name: Afterburn
effect: Reduces your APT by 5 while active. You continue to spew fire for 2 Turns, dealing 1d3 Fire Damage per Turn to every Character hit. You can move while this effect is active (keep your body orientation in mind)

name: Aid of Aloe
effect:
Allows a burn to fully heal over time without causing scar tissue.
Heals the injury by 1D6 immediately.

name: Aid of Flowers
effect:
Restore up to 1D6 + 3 Health to the target
(Can not heal injuries)

name: Aid of Laurels
effect:
Allows a Piercing Injury to fully heal over time without causing scar tissue.
Heals the injury by 1D6 immediately.

name: Aid of Tumeric
effect: Disinfects a flesh wound and prevents further infection for 1h

name: Aim Proficiency
effect: Increases Ranged Hit Chance by 1

name: Air Blast
effect:
Deals 1d3 Blunt Damage
?_Knocks back_Knock Back__ the target by 1m

name: Ambush
effect: At the beginning of combat, if you were not surprised, gain 1AP per Level

name: Analyse Ingredients
result:
You obtain information from the DM about the Active Ingredients in the Matter depending on the Quality:

< 10 : Wrong Primary Ingredient (e.g. %DQ%It primarily contains Apollium%DQ%)
10 - 19: No Information
20 - 49: Primary Ingredient without concentration (e.g. %DQ%It primarily contains Mortis%DQ%)
50 - 69: All ingredients except least (e.g. %DQ%It primarily contains Mortis as well as some Hypnum%DQ%)
70 - 89: All Ingredients except least and the dosage (e.g. %DQ%It primarily contains Mortis as well as some Hypnum, it has 3 doses per 100g%DQ%)
90+ : All Ingredients including dosage (e.g. %DQ%It contains: 3 parts Mortis, 2 parts Hypnum and 1 part Evigilis, it has 3 doses per 100g%DQ% / ?_3_MMMHHE_Alchemy_)
flavor:
%DQ%I. Analyse to further understanding%DQ%
-Alchemy for Beginners page 3

name: Animalistic Instinct
effect: You can feel if an animal within WIL * 100 meters of you is ?_afraid_Fear__ or hurt

name: Animate Zombie
effect:
Animates a dead body into a ?_Zombie_creatures?name=Zombie_Link_.
The zombie will die again, after a thousandth the normal life span of the creature whose soul was used

All Attributes of the Zombie are the same as in life except:
Maximum Mana, Mana Regen and Ranged Hit Chance are 0
Mental Attributes are each the minimum of the the Soul Shards Attributes and those the Zombie had in life

The Zombie is not under your control but is harmless and will stumble around aimlessly.

name: Animated Projections
effect:
Allows you to create animated illusions instead of still images.
While creating the Projection you may define any number of motions within the projections area, after you finish the spell the projection will perpetually loop through those motions.
(The illusion is still confined to it%SQ%s initial area, can not cause the projection to actually move around)

name: Aqueous Blade
ingredients:
Any bladed weapon
Weight of the blade in water
?_Essence of a Water Elemental_items?name=Elemental Essence Water_Popup_
result:
A Blade made out of water, it seems to drip but never diminishes in mass.
Damage increased by 1
The blade ignores all materials that can be soaked. It will pass through those materials simply soaking them and not damaging them otherwise.

name: Attack Proficiency
effect: Increases Melee Hit Chance by 1 per Level

name: Autistic
effect:
+2 INT
+4 REC
-2 GRE
-6 EMP

name: Bake Bread
result: Bread (20 + 4d6)

name: Banish
effect: Instantly moves all ?__ethereal__ Characters within 10m around you outside of that perimiter and deals 1d6 Holy Damage to them. Ethereal Characters that can not move through solid matter are placed as close to the perimeter as possible.

name: Barbed Vines
effect: Characters being ensnared by the vines take 1D3 Piercing Damage

name: Barter
effect: Increases CHA by 2 while bartering

Quartz Sand, Hydrocloric Acid, Saltpeter, Coal or Sulfur

effect: Target has Disadvantage on Parry and Dodge

effect: Deal 1D3 Piercing Damage

Transforms a percentage equal to the quality into Holy Water, the rest of the water evaporates

name: Blinding Touch
effect: The target becomes ?__blind__ for 2 turns

name: Blizzard
effect: Characters within 2 meters of you take 2 + 1d6 Frost Damage per Turn

name: Blocking Proficency
effect: Reduces the Hit Chance Penalty of Melee attacks by 2 per level while blocking.

name: Blood Boil

Increases MPA by 2
Increases Knockout Threshold by 10
Decreases all Hit Chances by 2

name: Blood Snare
conditions: Target must have a piercing wound
effect: Target becomes ?__ensnared__ for 2 Turns

name: Bloodscent
effect: You can sense piercing wounds of Characters who%SQ%s blood you touched within 24 hours

name: Bloodthirst

name: Bluffing
effect: Increases CHA by 1 while lying or bluffing

name: Bramble Thicket
effect: Characters moving inside of or through the thicket at an ?_Unsafe Speed_Rough Terrain__ take 1D3 Piercing Damage. If a Character falls inside the thicket they take an additional 1D3 Piercing Damage

name: Break Fall
effect: Increases CON by 1 per Level while trying to break a fall

name: Burst Lightning
effect: When the lightning hits the first target, instead of rolling a d2 to determine if the lightning jumps, it jumps to the closest 1d6 targets in range at once an no further after that (still affected by ?_Chaining_abilities?name=Chain Lightning Chaining_popup_)

name: Call Beast
chance: WIL, You have advantage if you can speak to the chosen kind of animal
effect: Call forth all animals of a species of your choice within 200m. The Animals will try to approach you but will not otherwise change their behaviour.

name: Calm Beast
chance: WIL/WIL Contest, You have advantage if you can speak to the chosen kind of animal
effect: Causes an animal to become calm and docile for 5 minutes. Does not prevent the animal from being enraged again

name: Chain Lightning
effect:
Deals 0 + 1D6 Fire Damage to the target.
Increases Charge by 1.
Whenever a target is hit roll a D2, if you roll a 1 Chain Lightning also hits the closest target within 1 + ?_Charge_rules?name=Voltaic_popup_ meters. One Chain Lightning can not hit the same target twice

name: Chain Lightning Chaining
effect: The lightning bounces at least once per Level

name: Change Facial Features
effect:
Morph the facial features of a Character by changing their size and position.
All features retain their usual function and can be moved and emoted with as normal.
These Changes are purely cosmetic, elongated facial features may clip through objects


May be dismissed at any time

name: Change Voice
effect:
Change the pitch or volume of any Character%SQ%s voice up or down by up to 50% down or 100% up
May be dismissed at any time by you but only after lasting for at least 5 minutes.
This effect is removed if the voice of the Character is changed by any other source.

name: Chef
effect: You may re-roll up to one d6 per level while cooking meals

name: Choke
conditions: The target must be grappled by you
effect: Deal 1D6 + (STR / 2) - 5 Blunt Damage

name: Choose Aspect
effect:
Choose an Aspect

?_Aspect of Fire__h_
Whenever you would deal Holy or Fire Damage you instead deal 50% Holy and 50% Fire Damage (rounded towards Holy)
?_Aspect of Peace__h_
Increase the strength of Barriers you cast by 50%
Reduce all Holy Damage you would deal to 0
?_Aspect of Decay__h_
Reduce all healing you would provide to 0
If a spell you cast would deal Holy Damage it deals Decay Damage instead
?_Aspect of the Hearth__h_
Increase the quality of all food you cook by 25
?_Aspect of the Moon__h_
At night, increases the Hit Chance of all your Divine Abilities by 0 to 3 depending on the week of the moon (0 for new moon, 1 for crescent and 3 for full)

name: Circle Cleave
effect: Deal Damage to all Characters within a 360 degree area instead of 180

name: Climbing
effect: Increases AGI and STR by 1 per Level while climbing

name: Combustion
effect: Doubles all Fire Damage the spell deals and turns it into Blunt Damage

name: Command Beast
chance: WIL/WIL Contest, The animal has advantage unless you can speak to it
requires_raw: Call Beast, Calm Beast, Frenzy Beast
effect:
Causes an animal to become subservient to you for 30min. The Animal gains the commands follow me, stay and attack and can be commanded non-verbally as long as you can see it

Controlling an Animal reduces your Willpower by the Animals Willpower

name: Compete
effect:
Roll a six sided die and add its result to the Attribute you use in this competition minus any penalties you have incurred during this contest.
If the result is higher than your opponents last result permanently increase their contest results by 2

name: Concentrate Tincture
result:
Reduces the Amount of Tincture by a Percentage up to the Quality while keeping the amount of Active Ingredients the same
Can not reduce the amount bellow 10% of the original but can be applied repeatedly

Example:
Ingredients: 100ml Water ?_1_MMA_Alchemy_
Quality: 60
Result: 40ml Water ?_1_MMA_Alchemy_
quality:
10 + 4d6
+10 for each ?_equipment level_rules?name=Crafting Equipment_Popup_
-20 for each power of ten below 1 liter of ingredients, round down to nearest power (-0 for 1L or more, -20 for 0.9999 to 0.1L, -40 for 0.099999 to 0.01L and so on)
flavor:
%DQ%III. Concentrate to increase potency%DQ%
-Alchemy for Beginners page 15

Applies to cakes, cookies and sweet pies.
Increases quality by 2d6 and allows you to re-roll up to four d6 per Level

Turn a Character%SQ%s face into an exact copy of a Face you know.

name: Corrosive Touch

ingredients: Two identical helmets made out of the same piece of metal
result: ?__items?name=beaconing helmet_Container_

name: Create Ember
effect: Create one Ember

name: Create Leather Armor
result:
Create a piece of armor with the defensive attributes corresponding to the defensive attributes of the creature the leather was from.

Base Deflection is based on the ?_leather_abilities?name=Tan Leather__
Base Padding is 0
Base Holy Resistance is 0
All other other base attributes are the creatures *natural* resistance values (e.g. you can not skin a fire mage to gain additional fire resistance)

Each resistance value of the final armor piece is equal to
2 * (Base Attribute) * (Quality in Percent)

ingredients: An object made from copper, 500g coal, 100g sulfur
result: Minor Fire Focus (40 + 3d6) ?__items?name=minor fire focus_C_

name: Create Rock

name: Create Shrub

Create a simple shrub without any special characteristics. The shrub begins to wilt over time and will die and crumble after 10 minutes
(The shrub is valid target for spells that require a ?__plant__. Remember: You may choose naturally occurring plants as targets for your spells and are not required to summon them yourself)

effect: Choose a ?__plant__ within 10 meters of you. An area with a 3 meter radius around the plant becomes covered in a dense thicket that counts as ?__Rough Terrain__.

effect: Creates up to 1 liter of water that disapears again after 1 minute

effect: Attacks with Reap Entrails have Advantage against targets with a lower maximum health than you

effect: You always know if the chosen Substance is one of the primary ingredients

name: Detect [Alchemical Substance]
effect: You always know if the chosen Substance is one of the primary ingredients

effect:

name: Down Draft
effect:
Reduces the MPA of all Characters in an area with a 3m Radius by 2
All ?__flying__ Characters in the Area must pass a CON Test when they move into the area or at the start of the channel if they are already inside or ?_fall to the ground_on the ground__

name: Draft Jump

effect: All Effigies within 2m of the target deal 1d6 Holy Damage each to the target

effect:
You can sense lifeforms and Lightning.
Works through walls and other obstacles.
You can only sense if there is a life form, not what kind of life form it is or where exactly it is located.
High ?_Charge_Voltaic__ values (4+) and nearby Lightning Spells occlude your ability to sense lifeforms.

name: Ember Forge
effect:
Whenever you cast a Fire Spell, that isn%SQ%t a Cantrip, you create an Ember. Embers are small flames circling around you.
You may have up to 3 Embers at a time.
You may spend any amount of Embers to reduce the Mana Cost of a spell by 2 per Ember, if you do that spell will not Generate any Embers on its own.

effect: Choose a ?__plant__ within 10 meters of you. All Characters within a 3 meter radius around the plant must Dodge or be ?__ensnared__ for 2 turns.

effect: You may re-roll up to 1d6 per Enchantment Recipe you perform

effect: Deals 1d6 Holy Damage to all ?__Ethereal__ Characters within 3m around you and makes them visible to the naked eye for 1 Turn

effect: Decreases Hit Chance Penalty by 2

name: Extract Tincture
ingredients: Any single type of matter, 50ml of water per dose
result:
Transfers a percentage of Active ingredients equal to the Quality from the base matter to the water. The rest of the matter becomes unusable for alchemical use.
You can not transfer more than 1 dose per 50ml water, all doses left over are lost.
If you transfer less doses they will be diluted by the water
flavor:
%DQ%II. Extract to improve handling%DQ%
-Alchemy for Beginners page 10

name: Flash
effect:
Creates a bright flash of light at the chosen location.
Blinds every Character looking at light and is closer to it then their Perception(Sight) in meters for 1 Turn.

name: Flat Projection
effect:
Create a two dimensional image either on a surface or in mid air.
The image looks convincing to any onlooker and is almost indistinguishable from the real object from a distance (about 1 meter per Perception(Sight)), up close however it becomes obvious that it is a two dimensional image and has no depth to it.
The image is always on a fixed plane, you choose how this plane is oriented.
The image is invisible if viewed from a 90 degree angle.
The backside of the illusion shows the same image as the front but backwards

name: Fleet Footwork
effect: Increases your MPA by 2

name: Fling Rock
effect: Launch a rock you are holding. The rock deals 1d6 + 2 Blunt damage on impact

effect:
Allows you to sense when a plant near you is in pain, needs water or is in any other kind of distress
When you meditate plants around you seem to be more alive and a flowery scent surrounds you

name: Fools Gold
effect: Produces a golden coin from your hand that lasts for one minute. The coin seems semi-valuable for anybody looking at it but does not represent a specific monetary value or currency.

name: Form of the [Animal]
manacost: The larger mass between you and the animal divided by the smaller one rounded up
requires_raw: [Discover Spirit Animal]Discover Spirit Animal (Does not have to be the same animal)
effect:
Transform into the chosen Animal animal. Cast again to transform back into your original form.
You gain all Physical Attributes of the Animal and keep your Mental Attributes. You can not cast spells except Form of the [Animal] while you are transformed

effect: Restores 1d3 Health

name: Medicus
effect: You may re-roll up to one d6 per level while treating injuries

name: Melting Point
effect: Your next Fire spell also ignores up to 5*X Fires resistance (This can not reduce the Resistance of the target below 0)

name: Mend
result:
Reduces the size of an injury by Q/50 + 1.
Can only be used once per injury.

name: Metallic Transmutation
effect:
Transmutes a percentage of the metal equal to the quality in percent, the rest of the matter becomes quicksilver

It is impossible to create gold this way.
Any magic imbued into the metal dissipates once the procedure has begun.
result: Any non-magical metal except gold

name: Mimic Melody
chance: CHA (Bonuses for playing the chosen Instrument apply)
effect:
Create any melody played by any instrument at the chosen location.
The sound may have any volume as longs as it is not loud enough to cause pain.

You may stop the melody at any time
You may only mimic 1 melody at a time

name: Mimic Sound
effect:
Create any sound you know at the chosen location.
The sound may have any volume as longs as it is not loud enough to cause pain.
If the sound is a voice it may convey emotion but is unintelligible.

name: Mimic Voice
effect:
Mimic any voice you know
The voice may say as much as possible with X Action Points

name: Mind Blast
effect: Deals 1d6 Arcane Damage to the target

name: Mind Control
effect:
If you win the contest the target will from now on obey any command you give to them (verbal or otherwise). While you control the target your WIL is reduced by the targets WIL.
When you are dealt damage or become ?__unconscious__ or ?__distracted__ the target may initiate another WIL/WIL contest over any distance to try and break free from you (note that your wil is reduced)

name: Mirror Image
effect:
Creates a mirrored copy of yourself. The copy will always move as if a mirror was placed between the two of you.

Is automatically dismissed if you cross the %DQ%mirror%DQ% or distance between you and the copy exceeds 20 meters

The copy will clip through objects.

name: Molded Projection
effect:
Create a three dimensional image constructed out of any number of two dimensional polygons (may be infinitely detailed so far as to appear smooth but has no actual %SQ%depth%SQ% to it).
The image looks convincing to any onlooker and is almost indistinguishable from the real object.
The polygons are invisible if viewed from a 90 degree angle.
The backside of the polygons show the same image as the front but backwards

name: Moving Projections
effect:
Allows you to move the entire area containing the projection while defining its movement loop
(The illusion will %SQ%snap%SQ% back to it%SQ%s origin at the end of the loop)

name: Muffle
effect:
Put your hand on the targets mouth to silence it.

During the grapple contest the target is silenced
You may choose to no longer silence the target removing the Contest Result penalty imposed by this Maneuver

If the grapple was successful the target remains silenced until the grapple ends or you choose to no longer muffle the target
Should the target initiate another contest while it is muffled the Contest Result penalty continues to apply
tags: Silence, Hush, Mute, Gag, Muffle, Hand

name: Multi Handed Counter
effect:
Increases Critical Parry Chance by 1 while wielding two or more Weapons
If you perform a ?__Counter Attack__ due to this ability it must be with a weapon you didn%SQ%t use to Parry

(Critical Parry Chance can not exceed Parry Chance)

name: Multi Jump
effect:
You may jump once per Level while you are in mid air, resets when you touch solid ground.
Jumping in mid air work as if you hit a platform and jumped off of it for all purposes, this means mid air jumping does not negate fall damage

name: Musically Gifted
effect: +2 CHA when playing any instrument or singing

name: Necryosis
effect: Whenever you apply Frostbite to a Character they take Frost Damage equal to the number of Frostbite stacks they have (including the new one)

name: Nova
effect: Deals 1d6 + 3 Fire Damage to all other Characters within a 1 meter radius

name: Noxious Fumes
effect: Characters that failed the CON Test also take 1D3 Decay Damage

name: One with the Forest
effect: Increases your Mana Regeneration by 2 while you are in a forest

name: Opacity
effect: Increases the Hit Chance Penalty by 1 per Level

name: Organic Transmutation
effect:
Turns a percentage of the organic matter equal to the quality, the rest of the matter becomes ash

Can not create complex structures, only lumps of the chosen material. Results don?t count as any specific kind of Flesh, Bone, etc. (For example: you can not create a %DQ%Cat%SQ%s Bone%DQ% or a %DQ%Leper%SQ%s Bone%DQ%, only a %DQ%Bone%DQ%)
result: ash, horn, flesh, wood, tallow, blood or bone (20 + 4d6)

name: Over Drain
effect:
You always drain the full amount of mana
If the target does not not have enough mana to drain they take Arcane damage equal to the difference

name: Overhead Swing
implement: Any Two Handed Weapon except spears, One Handed swords, bludgeons and axes.
effect:
Decrease Hit Chance by 4
Increases Force by 4
Increases Damage by 2

name: Paralyze
effect: Targets hit by the spell must pass as CON Test or be ?__paralyzed__ for 1 Turn

name: Parry Proficiency
effect: Increases Parry Chance by 1 per Level

name: Penetrating Stench
effect: Characters have disadvantage while performing the CON Test

name: Perceive Calamity
effect: You can feel if a Character within WIL * 100 meters of you fumbles

name: Perfect Self Image
conditions: The Illusion replicates a discernible part of you (face, voice, etc. not a hand or foot)

name: Persuation
effect: Increases CHAR by 1 while persuading somebody

name: Pick Pocketing
effect: Increases FIN by 1 while pickpocketing

name: Pickpocket
effect: Increases FIN by 1 while pickpocketing

name: Piquer de l&#39Abeille
conditions: Can only be used after a successful non-critical Parry or as a Counter
effect:
Increases Critical Hit Chance by 3.
Increases Force by 3.
Decreases Hit Chance by 3

name: Play [Instrument]
effect: Increases CHA by 1 while playing the [Instrument]

name: Poisonous Thicket
effect: Characters damaged by the thicket take an additional 1 Decay damage per Level

name: Prepare [Animal]
effect: Increases the quality of dishes made of the chosen animal by 2d6 and allows you to re-roll up to four d6 when preparing that animal

name: Punch
effect: Deal 1D6 + (STR / 2) - 5 Blunt Damage

name: Pyroclasm
effect: Deal 2d6 + 2 Fire Damage to all Characters in a 2 meter radius

name: Pyrosonic Blast
effect: When you reach your destination deal 1d6 Fire Damage and 1d6 + 4 Blunt Damage to all Characters within a 2 meter Radius.

name: Radius Nova
effect: Increases the radius by 0.5m per Level

name: Range
effect: Doubles the range of call beast once per Level

name: Range Call Beast
effect: Doubles the range of call beast once per Level

name: Reach Fire Lance
effect: Range becomes infinite, reduces damage dealt by 2 for each meter the torrent travelled. (The torrent still stops after the first target it hits)

name: Reap Entrails
effect:
Instantly kills any target with entrails and 4 or less HP
Attack deals no damage otherwise.
If the target is killed this way all enemy Characters within a 4m radius and line of sight towards you must pass a COU Test or be ?_afraid_Fear__ of you.

name: Recall
conditions: You must be able to see the object
effect:
Causes the recalled object to quickly move towards your hand. The object will slow down in order to not hurt you.
The object can only move in a direct line towards you

name: Repel Beast
effect: Causes an animal to become ?_afraid_Fear__ of you and flee if possible

name: Restore
result: Reduces the size of an injury by Q/50.

name: Rig Plant
actionpoints: Channel X, where X is the AP Cost of the base spell
effect:
Choose a floral spell and a ?__plant__ before you start Channeling.
Imbue a ?__Sigil__ with the trigger %DQ%Any Character within 1m%DQ% and the Effect of the base spell on the plant

name: Ritual of Stolen Health
result:
Transfers an injury with a remaining size of Q/10 or less from one person to another. The healed person has heavy scarring where the injury use to be.
If the Quality is not sufficient to transfer the whole injury, transfer as much as possible.

name: Ritual of the Clawed Hand
ingredients:
A severed hand (no older than 30min)
10 liters of blood from carnivorous animals
4 Candles
The heart of a herbivorous animal the owner of the hand killed with their bare hands
result:
Replaces the severed hand with a clawed hand.
?__items?name=clawed hand_Container_

name: Ritual of the Split Tongue
ingredients:
The tongue of a person who trusted you
The blade used to cut out the tongue (not consumed)
50 grams of silver
result:
Your tongue becomes visibly split like a snake tongue.
?__items?name=split tongue_Container_
quality: 20 + 3d6 + Xd6 where X is the number of years you knew the tongues owner

name: Ritualist
effect: Increases the Quality of all Demonic Rituals you perform by 10

name: Rotisseur
effect:
Applies to roasts, steaks and barbecues.
Increases quality by 2d6 and allows you to re-roll up to four d6 per Level

name: Running Assault
conditions: Last Action was movement with a speed of at least 10 straight towards the target
effect: Decrease your Hit Chance and increase your Force each by half your current speed (Note: current speed =/= MPA).

name: Sandblast
effect:
Launches a handful of sand at the target.
If the target can see and is hit in the eyes it becomes ?__distracted__ for 1 Turn

name: Sandstorm
effect:
Create a sandstorm in an area with a 30m radius around you, all Characters inside the sandstorm are ?__distracted__ and have their sight reduced by 5
If cast indoors the area is limited to the current room

name: Savage Cleave
effect:
Deals Damage to all Characters within a 180 Degree area and in melee range in front of you in order from your main hand to your off hand.
If the target dies or is destroyed continue on to the next target in order.

If you are affected by Blood Boil you always hit all targets even if they don%SQ%t die

name: Savage Leap
effect:
Jump up to 3 + 1d3 towards the target
If you have the targets Blood Scent you may jump at least 5 meters

name: Savage Presence
effect: All animals that can see or smell you become ?_afraid_Fear__ of you unless they pass a COU Test

name: Savage Roar
effect: All  enemy Characters that can see or smell you become ?_afraid_Fear__ of you unless they pass a COU Test

name: Sense Death
effect: You can sense when a Character within 100m dies

name: Sense Ghosts
effect: You can see ?__Ethereal__ Characters

name: Shackle
effect: Decreases the Dexterity of Characters trying to slip or loosen knots you tied by 1 per Level

name: Shadow Dash
effect: Dashing makes no sound

name: Shadow Step
effect: Your feet do not leave an impression on the ground and your footsteps are completely silent

name: Shimmer
effect:
Causes the air inside a sphere with a radius of 1 meter to shimmer and %DQ%smudge%DQ% light passing through it.

If a Character aims through the shimmer their Hit Chance is reduced by 4

name: Shock
effect: Deals 1d6 Fire Damage

name: Silencing Touch
effect: The target becomes ?__silenced__ for 2 turns

name: Singing
effect: Increases CHA by 1 while singing

name: Skull Cracker
effect:
Decrease Hit Chance by 4
Increases Force by 4
Increases Damage by 2

Increase Knockout Chance by 2

name: Sleigh of Hand
effect: Increases FIN by 1 per Level when performing sleigh of hand

name: Smite
effect: Deals 1d6 Holy Damage

name: Smiting Blow
implement: Any Melee Attack except Rapier and Dagger
effect: Deals an additional 1d3 Holy Damage, if the weapon would cause Blunt damage it deals 1d6 Holy Damage instead of 1d3

name: Snatch
effect: +1 STR per Level when trying to grapple another Character while unnoticed by them

name: Song of Dreams
effect: All Characters that can hear you must pass a WIL Test or fall ?_asleep_sleeping__ until they are awoken or the song ends
flavor: A soft and soothing melody, it wiggles into your ear and lulls you to sleep.

name: Song of Joy
effect:
All Characters that can hear you feel a rush of joy wash over them.

Can not be used to calm enraged Characters.

name: Spew Fire
effect: Deals 1d6 + 2 Fire Damage to all Characters within a 90

name: Sprinting
effect: Increases your maximum movement speed by 1 per level while sprinting (this does not increase your base MPA)

name: Stab
implement: Any Pointed Weapon except Dagger and Pike
effect: Increases Force by 3. Decreases Hit Chance by 3

name: Stabbing Branch
effect:
Choose a ?__plant__ within 10 meters of you. Target Character within 2 meters of the plant takes 1D6 + 3 Piercing Damage.
If the target takes at least 8 Piercing Damage the branch gets stuck in the targets body and the target becomes ?__ensnared__ for 2 turns or until the branch is removed (12AP, performable by victim or any other Character in melee range)

name: Steadyshot
effect: Steady your hands for to increase the Hit Chance of your next shot (without any actions in between) by 4

name: Stitch Wound
result: Closed Wound (20 + 4d6)

name: Strange Sounds
effect: Create a simple noise like a scream%COMMA% a bang%COMMA% a whistle or howling wind at the chosen location%COMMA% loud enough to be heard over 15 meters

Target must be grappled or be grappling you
You have more than 0 Stamina
effect: Target loses 5 Stamina

name: Tear Asunder
effect: Reap Entrails is guaranteed to hit if you have grappled the target

name: Telekinesis
effect:
Allows you to pick up objects with your mind and move them around freely.

What objects you can ?_lift_Lifting__ is determined as usual with some exceptions:
- Use your WIL - 5 instead of your STR to determine if you can lift the object
- Reduce your WIL equal to the distance in meters rounded down between you and the object
- Modifiers like slippery surface do not apply

name: Telepathy
effect:
Allows you to telepathically communicate with Characters in a radius equal to your INT.
Those Characters can not answer you telepathically unless they themselves are telepaths.

name: Telepocket
effect: Allows you to use telekinesis for pick pocketing by rolling for WIL instead of FIN, modifiers work the same way as regular Telekinesis, the base reduction by 5 does not apply

name: Thaumaturg
effect: Increase the Quality of all Enchantment Recipes you perform by 1d6

name: Thaumopath
effect:
You can detect the casting of spells by sensing changes in the aether.
The more mana is spent to cast a spell the further you can sense it. (Range ~ Mana * 0.5m)
You can not sense what kind of spell is being cast, only the approximate amount of mana spent.
Walls do not occlude spells.

name: Toxic Fumes
effect: Characters that failed the CON Test also take an additional 1 Decay Damage per Level

name: Tracking
effect: Increases INT by 1 while analysing tracks

name: Transform Cutlery
effect: Bend a spoon, knife or fork

name: Tremor
effect: All other Characters within 5m must pass a CON Test or fall to the ground

name: Turn up the Heat
effect: The next Fire spell you cast deals an additional (X/5)d6 Fire Damage. Does not stack, highest X value takes precedence.

name: Unarmed Parry
effect: Parry an attack

name: Uppercut
effect:
Decrease Hit Chance by 4
Increases Force by 4
Increases Damage by 2

name: Vicious Thicket
effect: Characters moving below Unsafe Speed also take 1D3 Piercing Damage when moving inside of or through the thicket

name: Vintner
effect:
Applies to spirits, beers and wines.
Increases quality by 2d6 and allows you to re-roll up to four d6 per Level

name: Volumetric Projection
effect:
Creates an actual three dimensional still image.
The image is indistinguishable from the real object by sight alone but can be recognized by other senses.
The image makes no sound and has no actual substance (other object will move through it)

name: War Caster
effect: You may ?_meditate_Meditation__ while not at full stamina as long as you do not have more than 10% per level less stamina than your maximum

name: Water Blast
effect:
Deals 1d3 Blunt Damage to the target
?_knoocks back_Knock Back__ the target by 1m

name: Whirling Death
effect: If the target is killed or destroyed the weapon continues on in a straight line until it falls to the ground or hits something else. If the new target is also killed or destroyed repeat this process

name: Wield [Ranged Weapon]
effect: Increase Hit Chance with [Ranged Weapon] by 1 per Level

name: Yield Harvest
effect: Extract a single fruit that the plant could produce or extract one dose of any substance that plant could produce

name: [Animal] Quick Morph
effect:
Transform into the chosen Animal if it has between four times and a fourth of your mass. Cast again to transform back into your original form.
You gain all Physical Attributes of the Animal and keep your Mental Attributes. You can not cast spells except Form of the [Animal] while you are transformed

name: [Animal] Tongue
effect: Allows you to talk to animals of the chosen ?_group_Animal Groups__

name: [One Handed] Attack Speed
effect: Reduces the Action Point Cost of attacking with the chosen weapon by 1 per Level but not below 50% of the original value

name: [Two Handed] Attack Speed
effect: Reduces the Action Point Cost of attacking with the chosen weapon by 1 per Level but not below 75% of the original value

name: [Weapon] Attack
effect: Increases your Hit Chance with [Weapon] by 1 per Level

effect: Reduces the Hit and Parry penalty for using [Weapon] with your offhand by 2
